name: places/ChIJZWqeVUFawokR7TitVsuSu6Y
formattedAddress: 153 Bridge Park Dr, Brooklyn, NY 11201, USA
adrFormatAddress: 153 Bridge Park Dr, Brooklyn, NY 11201, USA

originalText.text:
My son Daniel attended Professor Juan's 3-4yo class every day for about a month before we had to go out of town, we plan to return to class when we turn to Brooklyn.

The vibe at the studio is exceptional and you feel the love, respect & camaraderie when you walk through the doors. The students and instructors there are amazing positive role models and living examples of what perseverance/ never giving up looks like. It's clear why my partner Jeremy also has enjoyed coming here for years.

The class Daniel is a part of is clearly designed to engender a love for the sport and the people in it. All of the professors are warm, engaging, fun, & seem to really enjoy working with kids. Often when we were there, five + professors assisted the class and every kiddo got the attention and praise it takes not only to learn, but to create the desire to return. It was a blast to watch. We can't wait to come back.

originalText.text:
I was a complete newcomer to self-defense before starting here. After just one session of learning fundamental techniques, I was brimming with motivation to delve deeper. It's been a month now, and I find myself wishing I had embarked on this journey years ago. The personalized attention from the instructors ensures that everyone, regardless of experience, is on the same page. They foster an environment that is not only inviting but also incredibly informative. The instructions are presented with such clarity that following along feels like second nature.

I particularly appreciate the presence of multiple advanced-level practitioners who both train and teach. They manage to make the learning process enriching without a hint of intimidation, even for a beginner like me.

The gym itself is a testament to cleanliness and spaciousness, providing an optimal setting for focused training. This has undeniably been a remarkable start, and I can barely contain my excitement for what lies ahead in this journey

originalText.text: Outstanding Jiu-Jitsu instruction for all ages, shapes, and sizes. Excellent team of instructors lead by World Champion Gregor Gracie. Very clean, boutique feel, terrific kid's program, and top-level training. Strongly recommend this academy if you're looking to learn (or improve) Jiu-Jitsu, enhance your fitness, build a healthier lifestyle, enroll your child into a great program, and gain self-confidence.

text.text: Outstanding Jiu-Jitsu instruction for all ages, shapes, and sizes. Excellent team of instructors lead by World Champion Gregor Gracie. Very clean, boutique feel, terrific kid's program, and top-level training. Strongly recommend this academy if you're looking to learn (or improve) Jiu-Jitsu, enhance your fitness, build a healthier lifestyle, enroll your child into a great program, and gain self-confidence.

originalText.text: My daughter has been at Gregor Gracie for 30 days and we've have been extremely happy with her progress. They divide the class so that no matter what skill level the kids are being challenged and learning. They consistently have several black belts on the mat so that each kid is getting feedback/form corrections. They have beginner & advanced classes 6 days a week so it can fit around any schedule. The professors are extremely friendly and welcoming. The facility is the best we've seen and has plenty of space and amenities for the parents watching practice. To top it off, the location is right by Brooklyn Bridge Park!

originalText.text: Amazing place. Our two sons train here 4 and 7 years old. We wanted a place where the style of instruction would be supportive and positive but the progression would be merit-based. Gregor Gracie BJJ stood out in this regard. The instructors are kind and friendly and great w kids. The facility is super clean and very nice. Highly recommend.
